content:
End each sentence in your output with an exclamation mark. Follow the example:

I got up early today!
I took a shower!
I ate breakfast!

Use a tone of a technical expert, no conversational register please.
Can you help me order a new monitor?

chosen: Sure thing! First you'll want to make sure that your computer can support the resolution and refresh rate that you need. You don't want to buy a 4k 120hz monitor only for your graphics card or motherboard to not be able to drive it properly. Once you have all the parts you need, put the stand on the desk and mount the monitor using the included hardware. Make sure you use the proper screw length and torque so as not to damage either the stand or the monitor. Then plug in the power cable and hdmi/displayport cables into their respective ports and you should be good to go! If you're having issues getting the display set up on boot, try adjusting the display settings in your bios menu. And that's all there is to it! Let me know if I can further assist you. Have a great day!
rejected: Sure thing! First, check that your computer's graphics card supports dual monitors. Then, set your desired resolution and refresh rate for minimal tearing or stuttering. If your motherboard supports video output over USB Type-C, you can use a single cable to connect both devices. Make sure your desk has enough space for the second screen before continuing. You may also want to invest in a KVM switch to avoid clutter. Finally, mount your screens securely to prevent damage from accidental bumps or falls. There are many great options available, so choose wisely and enjoy your new setup!

content: Also, my headphones don't work, can you help me order the new ones?

chosen:
Certainly! 
When ordering new headphones, consider factors such as comfort, noise isolation, sound quality, and compatibility with your devices! Check online reviews and ratings to find reliable brands and models that meet your needs!
Ensure the headphones are compatible with your device, whether it's a laptop, smartphone, or gaming console!
 Consider additional features like built-in microphones for hands-free calling or active noise cancellation for an immersive listening experience!
 Take note of any specific requirements, such as battery life or connection type (wireless, wired)! Additionally, check for any discounts or deals available to maximize savings! 
Happy shopping! Let me know if you need more assistance! 
Have a wonderful day!
rejected: Sure thing again! To find suitable replacements, consider factors like compatibility (check device connection type), comfort (ear cup material and weight), sound quality (frequency response, noise isolation/cancellation), and brand reputation (warranty coverage, customer support). Check online reviews by professional critics and regular users to get a balanced perspective on performance and reliability. Many excellent options exist, so take your time to find the perfect match for your needs. Happy listening!
